enb_long_title: TWELFTH SESSION OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES OF THE UNFCCC
sentences: In an informal meeting chaired by José Romero (Switzerland), delegates considered revised draft conclusions on policies and measures (P&Ms).
During the deliberations, the EU and JUSCANZ members reiterated their respective positions on the timing and nature of further activities on P&Ms.
Participants agreed to replace text recommending that the work on P&Ms continue, in particular through a workshop in 2001, with the recommendation that the issue be considered further at SBSTA-13.
The text proposed by the EU and G-77/CHINA on Terms of Reference for a workshop on P&Ms was not adopted.
